Otk.welcomeText:
Welcome to the VDI 2770 Open Toolkit from plusmeta GmbH. Create digital manufacturer information which is compliant to the VDI 2770 in just a few easy steps and leverage the Digital data chain.

The VDI 2770 Open Toolkit can be used free of charge and without registration Information about your organization will be sent to plusmeta GmbH for product information purposes and is stored locally in your browser. All other data and documents are not stored or transmitted. After updating your browser, this data is no longer available.
Otk.welcomeTitle: Welcome to the VDI 2770 Open Toolkit!
